Articles.Content:
Hi there!

So I've been playing the game since the early simpler stages stopped and now I'm back.

I installed CKAN and found some nice mods.

this is the list of mods a youtuber uses:

http://i.imgur.com/Vt7QjJT.jpg

All I added was Kerbal Construction Time.

Now I launched a rocket made some science recovered and then invested the science for some nice parts.

When I went to the VAS the parts were not there!

I go back to the science building and lo and behold it's like I never researched anything! and upon looking at the amount of science I had it still showed as if I had the parts. (Showed 2.3 Science instead of 31 something).

sooooo.. What now?

Thanks for all the help

P.S Everything was up to date the mods and the game..

Non steam install
